abstract: Off the Rails: Charlton Street, a West Village lane that had been included on previous subway maps, has vanished from the current version.
snippet: Off the Rails: Charlton Street, a West Village lane that had been included on previous subway maps, has vanished from the current version.
lead_paragraph: Charlton Street, a sleepy three-block lane in the southern end of the West Village, is not exactly the most famous roadway in New York. Its achievements, by this city's standards, are average stuff: a row of landmark 19th-century town houses; a former residence of George Washington.

headline.main: A Village Street Slips Quietly Off the Subway Map
